snippet: For his installation “Tears Become ... Streams Become ...,” which features piano concerts by Hélène Grimaud, the artist Douglas Gordon has made the Park Avenue Armory’s Drill Hall a vast pool.
abstract: Douglas Gordon installation Tears Become... Streams Become..., at the Park Avenue Armory, features pianist Helene Grimaud performing one-hour program of works inspired by water as controlled flood transforms Wade Thompson Drill Hall into lake.
lead_paragraph: For his installation “Tears Become ... Streams Become ...,” which features piano concerts by Hélène Grimaud, the artist Douglas Gordon has made the Park Avenue Armory’s Drill Hall a vast pool.

headline.seo: ‘Tears Become Streams Become ’ Fills the Park Ave. Armory
headline.main: A Stage, a Pool, a Flood of Ideas
